Few words about FM2013 crack . First of all i want to say that being left in dark without answer from skidrow it isnt nice i know that you guys are cracking games for free , for all of us who can't afford , can't get games in some countries or just think that some of them are overrated and overpriced , further on about conspiracy theory that you took money frome SEGA not to relase FM crack , we dont have any problem with that, people around the world are grateful for thousands of free games and software that you and all scene groups around the world are making available for us, you guys are last stand and defence from imperialist Empires, you keep fighting for freedom risking your own safety and we are eternal grateful , but i think its rude that you dont dignify us with answer, single post about FM saying "hey people we will not relaese crack for FM this year or we are doing are best but we cant crack it yet "(which i doubt since the first version of semi working crack was relesed 3 days after the game was released) , and if conspiracy theory is true i call all scene groups to start working on crack for FM if not this year , then next so that all  scene gruops can ask ransom money from Miles Jacobson (beacuse Miles is one small minded money hungry  prick who is selling his FM series every year with few small changnes in comparison to previous game , and he is selling it for full price of 50$ like they did something revolutionary , insted they just polished last year game , dont get me wrong i am huge fan of FM) moving on it isnt fair that only skidrow take money from Sega , sharpe your knowledge and next year all hackers around world should make some money racketeering Miles Jacobson . Either way conspiracy theory or just game being hard to crack million people around the world would like to hear some info about FM crack. Cheers 
P.S if you(readers;) agree with this post copy it to all forums related about fm so that people from scene can read it.

i want to tell something cause i am fed up
1) iam gratefull to skidrow for their free games bla bla bla.Always was since Amiga times.
2)BUt i think this time they make a huge FAIL
They rushed to release the game without checking if it properly works.They told us to w8.We w8 and suddenly they tell us we dont release the fix cause some morons were ungratefull bla bla bla.
Ok i agree u dont own us nothing skidrow but somewhere u lost the whole point.If u havent the goal to crack the game then u shouldnt give a try with a bad fix.Now no other group will make a shot.If u crack games for fun and learning purposes only then u can crack a game and never release the crack.Keep it for urselfs.
Its reasonable thing when crack a game loved by many many many people, and its no working, those people get inpatient.I personly never going buy the game.If Si sold it in reasonably price ok.
In the scenario  that u cant crack the game, i d prefer to tell so.
Or the whole "hate messages" is an excuse for not be able to crack the game?I dont know at this point.
At least RELOADED and RAZOR(when they were active) rarely released a malfunctioning crack like u do in many games.
U cant provide all the internet with cracks and when suddenly stop at one game for whatever reason, exept all the people w8ing for u something ,to react normally.There are not many scene groups out there.(SKIDROW n RELOADED) maybe u SKIDROW react like this
If there was many groups and competition in scene, maybe things were diffirent.
In other words i believe u lost the point of the SCENE becoming selfish and arrogant.
When comes to games  especially good ones no matter the age of some person, he feel like a child, react like a child.So its reasonable to spam u with hate and ungratefull comments.
The whole point of the scene in our eyes was : w8 ing something from ppl that we think are heroes.
We cant all pay for a game even if it costs 40euros.
Lots of us working for much less than we deserve and barely making money for basic needs.
Anyway i lost faith in SkIDROW and i will never DL a game with their NFO in the game folder.
STill thankfull for alll previous Downloads but no more.
Sorry for my broken  ENGLish.
Even i i sound bitter i honestly am gratefull to SKIDROW.
BB have  peace.From now on FAcebook games.They ask money clever but still more honest than game companies who sell DVD's and SKIDROW.

- They are not even "the prefered site of Skidrow" .. as I have been informed from their own admins. - Skidrow does NOT upload to that URL.

- And for "TurkishToonFan01" - he is NOT a part of the cracking team of SKIDROW in ANYWAY!. Truth is that he is a 19 yo Turkish boy - living in London, and working as a sales person in a clothing store ! (that is the REAL truth :D)

.. Just a pathetic little kid who tried to get glory on others achievements.

Fact is that NO ONE knows if SKIDROW have given up on the crack.. TurkishToonFan01 just started getting frustrated that more and more people were starting to realize that he has NO association with SKIDROW.

Another fact is that SKIDROW does NOT have a homepage, email or any other from of public way of communication. - So NO comments will EVER come from SKIDROW themselves.. their work speaks for themselves..
